alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Logan and southwestern Johnson Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ratcliff, or near Paris, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Paris... Hartman... Ratcliff... Hoyt... Woodland... Hinkle... Coal Hill... Caulksville... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Harmony... Roseville... Union City... Hunt... Carbon City... This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 44 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Western and Northern Logan County
